description: The UCO Foundation Special Circumstance Scholarship Application is available to apply for during the fall and spring semesters of the current academic year. This application is reserved for students facing emergency financial hardship or other unexpected circumstances. It is not guaranteed that you will receive a scholarship. Applications will periodically be reviewed by a committee and the decision will be determined by them.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
